comment: Great teacher. I wish she would come back at least to teach one class. I will miss her a lot. Teaches from the heart and she is very intelligent. Just do your work and go to class and you will make good grades.

Had this class several years ago.  Now that I have graduated and I am teaching, I think more than I thought I would about this class.  She was an excellent teacher because she taught with her heart and well as head.
Wonderful teacher. Thoughtful approach to subjects that are offensive to some. Profound knowledge of culture. Class was fun. Highly recommend.

Very boring class. Not many projects/tests which is pretty good. She talks too much most of the time. I know she means well and tries hard, but I just don't like her style of teaching. There's a lot of discussions that I end up saying, "What was the point of that??" and I haven't learned anything from the class.

Disregard the other comments if you are taking her for an education class. She may be a good Spanish teacher, but as an EDUC teacher, she's terrible! It is so hard to get up and go to class just because this woman is so unbearable! She can be very patronizing, and if you do not agree with her, you're wrong. I'd advise to find someone else to take.
She is a great teacher-easy to follow and wonderful as an individual.  Sweet woman!
she is a very understanding teacher!  I highly recommend her to anyone and everyone!
